description: Board configurations in Mu Torere (for one player).
references: Ascher, Marcia; Mu torere: an analysis of a Maori game. Math. Mag. 60 (1987), no. 2, 90-100.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
mathematica: a[0] = 1; a[n_] := (1/2)*(Binomial[ 2*Quotient[n, 2], Quotient[n, 2]] + 2*(Binomial[ 2n-1, n] + Binomial[ n-1, Quotient[n, 2]]) + Sum[ EulerPhi[n/k] * Binomial[2k, k]/(2n), {k, Divisors[n]}]); Table[ a[n], {n, 0, 24}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jan 27 2012, after Pari *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Better description and more terms from _Michael Somos_
